title: International Wild Card All-Stars Event | Feedback
body:
Good Afternoon Summoners.

Just wanted to touch base about the recent Live event held right here in beautiful Melbourne In November.

I attended both the live event itself at Margaret Arena, as well as the Hoyts viewing party the following day.

My Background
Apart from loving eSports (including LoL) I am an event manager in my day to day life. Overall, the event was awesome, but I have included quite a bit of constructive criticism that I think is useful for future events.

You can find the articles summarizing my experience at the event below;

Day One - [Live at Margaret Court Arena ](http://www.thegamebastion.com/international-wildcard-all-stars-melbourne/)
Day Two - [Hoyts Viewing Party](http://www.thegamebastion.com/category/esports/)

replies.body: @MM kill yourself you autistic retarded loser %%%got

> [{quoted}](name=ViolinMaker53,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=mpGaiGgr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-12-17T10:35:04.719+0000)
>
> @MM kill yourself you autistic retarded loser %%%got

Well that escalated quickly.

Thanks for taking the time to follow up on the thread. Honestly, you guys did a fantastic job and it's unique & encouraging to see an international organization to actually invest time, effort & money into oceania. I think I was way more critical then most punters, just due to my professional background. 

It will be great to see what else is in store for 2016 (hopefully plenty of Melbourne activities!)

Great read. I shared both pages to the the team (this is the second link btw http://www.thegamebastion.com/international-wildcard-all-stars-melbourne-part-two/)

Thank you for the feedback.
